short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the price of gift card products
short.vi: Tính giá sản phẩm thẻ quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One Vanilla is a simple yet powerful Chrome Extension, designed to assist users in calculating the value and area of gift card products, while also providing detailed and convenient information. in this process.

Feature:

Calculate product value:

Users can select products from the list provided and enter quantities to calculate their total value.
Each product is listed with its name and product code for easy identification.
When the user clicks the "Calculator" button, the widget will display the total value of the selected products in USD currency.
The area:

Users can use this feature to calculate the area of an area based on the provided width and height.
When entering the width and height values in the corresponding fields and pressing the "Calculate Area" button, the widget will display the area of that area in square meters (m²).
Use:

Users simply install the extension on their Chrome browser and can quickly access it via the extension icon.
They can then select the product from the available list and enter the desired quantity to calculate the value.
In addition, users can also use the area calculation feature to perform area-related calculations.
